revised_title: A Detailed Account of a Thunder and Lightning Strike at Mrs. Close's House
tldr: A detailed account of a violent thunder and lightning strike at Mrs. Close's house in Ireland. The strike caused significant damage to the house, including breaking windows, damaging furniture, and singeing items. The author provides a thorough description of the event and its aftermath, including the physical damage and the smell of sulfur that lingered afterward.
